game.subtitle: Click the squares when you spot the scenes

shuffle.title: Shuffle tiles?
shuffle.message: This creates a new board with a new shareable link. Marked tiles will be reset.

reset.title: Reset marks?
reset.message: All marks will be removed, but the tile order stays the same.

changeGame.title: Change game?
changeGame.message: This will start a new game. Marked tiles will be reset.
